bill.title: Relating To The University Of Hawaii Community Colleges.
bill.description: Appropriates moneys for the University of Hawaii community colleges' workforce development programs to fund administration, training, positions, and student support. Effective 7/1/2050. (HD1)

history.action: Introduced.
Passed First Reading.
Referred to HRE/LCA, WAM.
Re-Referred to HRE, WAM.
The committee(s) on HRE has scheduled a public hearing on 02-10-22 3:00PM; Conference Room 229 & Videoconference.

The committee(s) on HRE recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in HRE were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Kim, Kidani, Wakai, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Keith-Agaran.
Reported from HRE (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2328) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading and referral to WAM.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading and referred to WAM.
The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 02-22-22 10:00AM; Conference Room 211 & Videoconference.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 11 Aye(s): Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Keith-Agaran, Inouye, Kanuha, Kidani, Misalucha, Moriwaki, Shimabukuro, Taniguchi, Wakai, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3126) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 1).
48 Hrs. Notice 03-08-22.
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 1 (Senator(s) Fevella). Transmitted to House.
Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 535) in amended form (SD 1).
Pass First Reading
Referred to HET, FIN, referral sheet 24
Bill scheduled to be heard by HET on Friday, 03-18-22 2:00PM in House conference room 309 Via Videoconference.

The committees on HET recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 10 Ayes: Representative(s) Takayama, Clark, Belatti, Costales, Ganaden, Gates, Hashimoto, Kapela, Quinlan, Okimoto; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Ohno, Woodson, Yamane.
Reported from HET (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1200-22) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.
Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) McDermott excused (1).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Wednesday, 04-06-22 1:30PM in House conference room 308 Via Videoconference.

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 15 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Yamashita, Branco, Eli, Holt, Ilagan, B. Kobayashi, Marten, Nishimoto, Perruso, Sayama, Tam, Todd, Wildberger, McDermott; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1845-22), recommending passage on Third Reading.
Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) McKelvey, Quinlan excused (2). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 573).
Senate disagrees with House amendments.
Received notice of disagreement (Sen. Com. No. 866).
Senate Conferees Appointed: Kim Chair; Wakai Co-Chair; Fevella.
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 873).
House Conferees Appointed: Takayama, Todd Co-Chairs; Kapela, Okimoto.
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 729).
Conference committee meeting scheduled for 04-26-22 4:45PM; Conference Room 229.
Conference committee meeting to reconvene on 04-27-22 4:00PM; Conference Room 229.
House Conferee(s) discharged.
Received notice of discharge of conferees (Hse. Com. No. 816).

votes.desc: Senate Ways and Means: Passed, With Amendments
House Higher Education & Technology: Passed, With Amendments
